subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Rick Majerus, who took Utah to the N.C.A.A. final in 1998, will be making his first appearance in the tournament since 2003 when St. Louis plays Memphis Friday.
snippet: Rick Majerus, who took Utah to the N.C.A.A. final in 1998, will be making his first appearance in the tournament since 2003 when St. Louis plays Memphis Friday.
